data.text:
75 Years

of Worldwide Industry Experience

Overview

A leading provider of heavy lift & transport services in Australia

At Lampson, we pride ourselves on being a leading provider of heavy lift and transport services in Australia, with more than 75 years of industry experience behind us. Our national fleet of equipment regularly services the civil construction, mining, energy and petrochemical sectors, providing a complete lifting and shifting solution.

We have a modern crane hire fleet and maintain our equipment regularly to ensure it remains safe and performs in optimal running order and to minimise the chance of onsite breakdowns. All of our equipment is also serviced to manufacturers’ standards. Our cranes have the capabilities of heavy lifting and shifting loads from 30 tonnes through to 3,000 tonnes, enabling us to efficiently support our clients’ heavy lift and transportation demands on both small and large-scale.

What We Do

We have the capability to heavy lift & shift loads from 30 tonnes through to 3,000 tonnes, enabling us to efficiently support our clients

Experience

Here at Lampson we are the leading provider of heavy lift & transport services in Australia, with more than 75 years of experience

Nationally Recognised

Our national fleet regularly services the civil construction, mining, energy & petrochemical sectors, providing a lifting & shifting solution

Extensive Range

At Lampson offers a huge range of heavy haulage and heavy lifting equipment for hire permanently located all throughout Australia

FUll Range

Our Equipment

Lampson offers a huge range of heavy haulage and heavy lifting equipment for hire permanently located throughout Australia. With depots located in Muchea near Perth and Karratha in Western Australia as well as Toronto in New South Wales, Port Pirie in South Australia and Calliope near Gladstone in Queensland, we can easily service your project’s requirements nationwide.

Accreditations

An award-winning lifting, transport and rigging company

We have received multiple awards for excellence from Australia’s Specialised Carrier & Rigging Association (SCRA). We are also a Quality Certified company to AS/NZS ISO 9001:2015, because of our total commitment to supplying superior heavy lift equipment & services Australia-wide.
